title: A Lot of Office-Friendly Lululemon Pants Are Up to 50 Percent Off
text:
8 items in this article 8 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy of the retailer

It’s no secret that Lululemon makes excellent workout leggings that look and feel good, but their workwear–slash–travel clothes are also surprisingly chic, especially when it comes to the pants. They’re comfortable enough to wear while lounging around the house but stylish enough that you might actually feel compelled to go outside. You could even wear them to the office, and we doubt any of your co-workers would clock them as athleisure. Best of all: There’s a bunch of these chic-yet-cozy Lululemon pants on sale right now, up to 50 percent off the list price.
